name: skwar
description:
not your average rage platformer...

The less HP you have, the faster you run! Your weakness is also your strength!

Reach the star before the time runs out! Checkpoints give more time, and you can manually decrease your HP (increasing your speed) to help you go faster, though you'll be more vulnerable!

Also this is kind of a rage game... unless your platforming skills are on point.

Made in about 3 hours of the Trijam 180!

If you're having trouble with the web version, try downloading the windows build!

Controls

WASD / Arrow keys to move.

Space / W / Up Arrow to jump.

S / Down Arrow to decrease HP manually.

P / ESC to pause.

PS4 Controller is supported! Joystick or arrows to move, Cross to jump and Square to manually decrease HP! Also Circle to pause.
